page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: WE HAVE THREE CHURCHES IN OUR VALLEY. ST PATRICKS, THE METHODIST, AND THE ROMAN CATHOLIC. MOST OF US IN OUR SCHOOL GO TO ST PATRICKS CHURCH IN PATTERDALE. WE MADE A MODEL OF THE CHURCH AND DID A DISPLAY OF WORK ABOUT THE CHURCH AND GRAVE YARD AND PUT IT AS A DISPLAY AT THE BACK OF THE CHURCH. THE PRESENT RECTOR IN ST PATRICKS CHURCH IS CALLED MR CRAWLEY. THE CHURCH IS MADE FROM STONE WITH A SLATE ROOF. THERE HAS BEEN A CHURCH ON THE PRESENT SITE FOR NEARLY 1000 YEARS. THE CHURCH IS DEDICATED TO THE IRISH SAINT, ST PATRICK. THE CHURCH YARD IS ALWAYS KEPT IN GOOD CONDITION BY THE LOCALS.
